name: Dickland: Mini Games
description:
Dickland: Mini Games is an exciting and funny collection of mini games in 2D. Among the collection there are such games as: "Puzzles", "Snake", "Find a couple" and others. The main feature is the visual, namely the amazing penis world.



Features of the collection:
- An unusual and original game world with its corresponding sounds and surroundings.
- Puzzles of varying degrees of difficulty.
- Achievements that you can get for your attentiveness and diligence.
